item.title: About me
item.description: A simple guy who sometimes makes simple apps and games. Maybe I’ll write some short blog posts.

item.title: Hit the gap!
item.description: The inspiration of hit the gap originates from years ago, when I was just a little kid. Back before when your imagination was a much larger part of your daily entertainment. Having nothing to do in the car, I’d try and judge when my car would line up in between things, cars, trees, road lights, that kind of thing, and when I thought I was right in between I’d click my teeth together.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: SimpleAppMan built the Hit The Gap app as an Ad Supported app. This SERVICE is provided by SimpleAppMan at no cost and is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service. If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy.

item.title: Projects
item.description: I’ve made some things, and I hope to make more.
